overview: Carl Beldon has disappeared and the Trail Blazers have been sent to investigate. Arriving in town, they find that 'Honest John' controls everything. He even prints his own money. He also has a gang and they set out to finish off the heroes.
tagline: FLASHING GUNS! Here's the Way to Tame Bad-Men...Give 'Em Plenty of Fists and Firearms!
title: Outlaw Trail
